item.title: OpenUSP Documentation
item.description: What is OpenUSP # OpenUSP is an open source implementation of Broadband Forum’s Universal Services Platform (USP). It consists of a Controller, Database, Message Broker, Command Line Interface (Cli) and REST ApiServer. Licenses # The project is licensed under “Apache License 2.0” which means you are free to use for your private or commercial purpose. Please read “Apache License 2.0” terms and conditions for more details Installation and Run # USP Controller and other modules as docker containers # git clone git@github.
